Welcome to Food Funda ChatBot! I can help you with your queries regarding Food Fortification, Edible Oil, Rice Fortification, Wheat Fortification etc. You can type or choose an option to talk to me.
If you are unable to find the answer, please type your question below.

Online Platforms

Food Safety Compliance System is an enhanced version of Food Licensing and Registration System which was launched in 2012 for issuance of Pan India FSSAI Licenses and Registration

Ensures compliance of Imported food Consignments

A Digital System for Exchange of information on food import rejections

INFoLNET will have a network of labs connected to a centralized system called Lab Management System

Each Food Business Operator needs to have at least one trained and certified person in their business premises to ensure food safety

Initiative to improve public health in India and combat negative nutritional trends

The FSSAI has identified key food safety themes to be addressed through a series of national-level stakeholder consultation programs in the year 2025.

Initiative to promote food safety and healthy eating when eating out in restaurants

Portal for approval of non - specified food and food ingredients

Payment of any kind of Fee on behalf of different subject divisions of the FSSAI can now be made Online through Credit Cards, Debit Cards, Net Banking, etc. through its online ePayment Portal of the FSSAI

Food- ‘O’-copoeia is a collection of food category-wise monographs which is a single point reference for all applicable standards for a specific product category

A Comprehensive information on standards, regulations, notifications, advisories, guidelines, contamination limits, and the latest developments by Food Regulators in India

Food consumers have a right to safe food and right to information about the food

FSSAI initiated a scheme to provide mobile units for food testing. These mobile units are called “Food Safety on Wheels”

RUCO

NetProFaN

International Training Centre for Food Safety and Applied Nutrition set up by the FSSAI in partnership with EIC and the Global Food Safety Partnership World Bank

Audit is a systematic independent and documented process for obtaining audit evidence and evaluating it objectively to determine the extent to which the audit criteria are fulfilled

Stay in the loop on food safety, nutrition and more! Follow FSSAI's social media handles for the latest updates and valuable insights.

X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/fssaiindia

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fssai

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fssai_safefood/

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/100777750/admin/feed/posts/

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@fssai_india
